name: Genesys
body:
### Welcome to Genesys Project.
Genesys is a (System|Code Generator) written in scala. This tool is made to facilitate the creation of custom code that we as developer end up doing at any project. Some Genesys uses handlerbar](http://handlebarsjs.com/) templates to generate the code.
Genesys supports 3 kinds of sources:
- Database(all major rdbms)
- Xml(Limited)
- Json(Pending)

### Support or Contact
This project is created and maintained by @serdna27 if you have any comments or enhancements to be made.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
